task.title: Content Alignment Checklist
task.description: Ensure LinkedIn themes are reflected on the website

checklist.item: Team leadership experience (not just individual contributor)
Full-stack capabilities (not just frontend or backend)
Continuous improvement and best practices focus
Current status as Senior Team Lead (not freelancer)

notes.note: The current site reads like it's from your 2018-2020 freelance period
Need to bridge 5+ year gap in content freshness
LinkedIn shows enterprise team leader; website shows freelance consultant
Both can be true, but positioning needs to be clearer
Consider whether freelance work is still something you want to promote
If not actively freelancing, pivot messaging entirely to team leadership and enterprise development
